title: SUM 5 times 1
code:
.ver 1

.data
dw		a 0
dw		cnst_1 1
dw		target 5

.fin	lblend

.code
begin:  add cnst_1, a ; a + 1
		cmp a, target
		beq lblend
		cmp 0xf, 0xf
		beq begin

lblend:

title: A * B
code:
.ver 1

.data
dw		a 5
dw		b 9
dw		resultado 0
dw		aux1 0
dw		aux2 0xFFFF

.fin	lblend

.code
start:  add a, resultado
		add aux2, b
		cmp b, aux1
		beq lblend
		cmp 11, 11
		beq start
		beq lblend

lblend:
